articles.title: Australian leads meth use among 20-odd countries in new report - ABC News
articles.description: Australia is at the top of a list of methylamphetamine use among more than 20 countries in Europe, Asia and Oceania, a wastewater analysis finds.
articles.content:

articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): There were 11,504 new Covid-19 cases recorded in Singapore on Tuesday (June 28), more than double the 5,309 cases on Monday.
